The Chivtrons base fully recharge as they begin to suck the power from
the vines covered around it. The vines begin to go limp and die
reavealing a a fully charged shield thanks to the button Trinity
pushed. Grounded falls to the ground barely breathing. His power also
is sucked from his connection to the natural forms. However life
always regrows and he stands up and stumbles to the defensive weapons
chair, deciding to leave the shields and other programs to this
jealous bot.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Banzai-Tron:::
>
> ::He was hit by one of the feather missles. He fired 1 missle at
Windlord and
> one at the Chivtron base::
